attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. Not all storms come to disrupt your life, some come to clear your path! Whatever the challenge, Bring it. The new Ranger Stormtrak  is ready to be your reliable partner for life, to take on any challenge life throws at you and to tackle the toughest of terrains, creating life’s most precious memories with you. Turn some heads wherever you go and own the day with the famous 2.0L Bi-turbo diesel engine producing 157 kW and 500 Nm. The two turbos work sequentially to deliver massive power and torque, combined with the state-of-the-art 10-speed automatic gearbox. We provide RWC and a 160 multi-point Ford Approved quality check on all of our vehicles for your peace of mind. Call CMH Ford Gezina today to arrange a test drive with any of our professional and friendly sales executives. Any trade-in welcome, we guarantee R10,000 more on any written offer. Easy finance available within 3 hours. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply.
